interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Black Mask Peel Off Mask Purifying Blackhead Remover Mask Deep Pore Cleansing Activated Charcoal Mask for Face Nose, Acne Treatment Oil Control
Review Date: 2017/03/06
Store: Reve Beauty
Product Description: ["Specifications: Mask Color: Black Gender: Unisex Type: Remove blackhead mask Fit for: All types of skin. The mask is NOT recommended for sensitive skin or those prone to skin irritations. Net Wet: 60g Shelf life:3 years Usage Method: 1. Use clean facial skin cleanser, and then with towel hot compress 3-5 minutes, wait for the pores opening. 2.Apply evenly on nose, face, frontal and chin etc. 3.Wait for 15-20 minutes, from top to down, and gently torn off. 4.Finally, please use the warm water to wipe clean. and then put some moisturizing Essence to your face. Tips for best result: 1. Suggest to use on T-zone, nose, and chin area first, if you feel the pain is OK, then try to whole face. 2. The thickness needs to be appropriate. If coating thickness is too thin,it is not easy to peel the mask on the whole piece and adsorption effect is not obvious . If it is too thick ,waiting time would be too long ,it is recommended to use daub amount to cover the skin. 3.Mild blackheads: once a week; Moderate blackhead: twice a week; Severe blackheads: 2-3 times a week. Please Pay Attention to: 1.Don't put a thick layer. Put just suitable enough. otherwise, you will feel painful when peeling off it. 2.Keep the mask mud away from your hair. 3.When mask is dry. from top to down, and gently torn off, not very quickly. 4.Apply a amount of the product at the back of the hand or ear, if no allergic reactions(itching, redness) within 5 minutes before using.If there is any discomfort, stop using. 5.For external use only. Avoid directly contact with eyes, brow and lips, if this occurs rinse well with lukewarm water at once. If you have any problems. Please contact us at any time. We look forward to serving you."]
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.25 x 10.08 x 3.3 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '721352051693 721352069162 721352059101', 'Manufacturer': 'Lantique'}
Review Text: Ordered this for my son and he really loves it. He finds that this kit is helpful because there are a variety of tools that address most skin issues. He also likes there is a kit that holds all of the tools which means that he can keep them together and doesn't have to look for them when needed.  And finally, this kit was affordable and even more reasonable than some that I have seen in several discount stores.
Review Title: Just what he needed.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Vitabrid C12 Vitamin C face brightening powder - 12hours Transdermal, the Best professional Vitamin C complex and LDH help brighten and minimize fine lines/wrinkles through collagen synthesis LUBEX ['State-of-the art 12-hour Transdermal Vitamin C powder for your face! Transdermal vitamin C powder for anti-aging and skin rejuvenation. Highly potent Vitamin C complex helps brighten, and minimize fine lines and wrinkles through collagen synthesis, making your skin bright, nourished and glowing with natural radiance.'] {'Brand': 'Vitabrid', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.1 x 2.6 x 1.5 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Hyundai IBT Co., Ltd'} This is perhaps one of the most difficult reviews that I have written in a while. Usually I know immediately if the product is a hit or miss, but Vitabrid C12 is different. I can’t decide. I’m torn. After using VC12 for about 3 weeks, I am still unsure of the results.

The concept: Vitamin C is slow released thru the skin by mixing a small amount of VC12, with water or a moisturizer, onto the face and neck. The results, brighter, smoother and firmer skin. The powder comes in a convenient small bottle (about the length of your thumb) with a small spoon (used for measuring). Simply mix the appropriate amount - I use about 2 spoonfuls since I put it on my face and neck- with a lightweight moisturizer. I didn’t notice any tightness, irritation or itching after I applied this to my skin (i.e., face and neck). I simply apply my makeup as usual. With that being said, I haven’t noticed anything bad either -no additional breakouts and no nasty white film (left on my face from bad blending). But I also haven’t looked in the mirror and said “wow” or “gosh, this is like a facelift in a bottle moment”. Not to mention that this product takes a little more effort than my usual skincare regime. I am not use to mixing products before I use them. **Therefore, I am going to give this product 3 stars BUT continue to use it for a little longer to see if I am wowed. After all each container is believed to last about 3 months. If I notice something earth shattering in the next month or so, I will amend my review. Otherwise, this review will stand. Undecided still. Black Mask Peel Off Mask Purifying Blackhead Remover Mask Deep Pore Cleansing Activated Charcoal Mask for Face Nose, Acne Treatment Oil Control Reve Beauty ["Specifications: Mask Color: Black Gender: Unisex Type: Remove blackhead mask Fit for: All types of skin. The mask is NOT recommended for sensitive skin or those prone to skin irritations. Net Wet: 60g Shelf life:3 years Usage Method: 1. Tips for best result: 1. Suggest to use on T-zone, nose, and chin area first, if you feel the pain is OK, then try to whole face. 2. The thickness needs to be appropriate. If coating thickness is too thin,it is not easy to peel the mask on the whole piece and adsorption effect is not obvious . If it is too thick ,waiting time would be too long ,it is recommended to use daub amount to cover the skin. 3.Mild blackheads: once a week; Moderate blackhead: twice a week; Severe blackheads: 2-3 times a week. Please Pay Attention to: 1.Don't put a thick layer. Put just suitable enough. otherwise, you will feel painful when peeling off it. 2.Keep the mask mud away from your hair. 3.When mask is dry. from top to down, and gently torn off, not very quickly. 4.Apply a amount of the product at the back of the hand or ear, if no allergic reactions(itching, redness) within 5 minutes before using.If there is any discomfort, stop using. 5.For external use only. Avoid directly contact with eyes, brow and lips, if this occurs rinse well with lukewarm water at once. If you have any problems. Please contact us at any time. We look forward to serving you."] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.25 x 10.08 x 3.3 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '721352051693 721352069162 721352059101', 'Manufacturer': 'Lantique'} Ordered this for my son and he really loves it. He also likes there is a kit that holds all of the tools which means that he can keep them together and doesn't have to look for them when needed. And finally, this kit was affordable and even more reasonable than some that I have seen in several discount stores. Just what he needed.
profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Skin Concerns**: Interested in products targeting skin brightness, fine lines, wrinkles, and blackhead removal.
- **Product Formulation Preference**: Favors innovative formulations, such as transdermal delivery systems and powders, as well as peel-off masks for deep cleansing.
- **Application Style**: Open to techniques that require mixing products before application and using multiple tools, indicating a willingness to engage in more involved skincare routines.
- **Skeptical Attitude**: Exhibits a cautious approach to new products, often needing time to assess effectiveness before forming a definitive opinion; tends to provide thoughtful, balanced reviews.
- **Effectiveness Expectations**: Seeks notable and immediate visible results but is willing to continue using a product to evaluate long-term benefits. Values products that address various skin concerns in an affordable manner.
- **Chemical Sensitivity**: Reports no irritation or adverse reactions to products, valuing gentle and skin-friendly formulations.
- **Multi-Use**: Utilizes products on both the face and neck, indicating a comprehensive skincare approach. Also appreciates well-organized product kits that enhance usability.

This user maintains a focus on effective ingredients in skincare, prioritizing anti-aging benefits and efficacy while maintaining caution and openness towards new tools and techniques to achieve desired results.
